connect.desired-wallet: Click on the wallet below and let us know which one you need more
connect.footer: We do not own your private keys and cannot access your assets without your confirmation.
connect.imtoken-reject: You have declined authorization, please refresh this page to authorize again.
connect.wechat: The current environment does not support metamask. You can connect Metamask in the browser.

auth.desc: Skip approving every interaction with your wallet by allowing Mail3 to remember you.
auth.sign: I authorize sending and checking my emails on mail3 from this device. This doesn't cost anything.

errors.wallet-not-connected: Wallet is not connected, please connect your wallet

bell.title: 🔔 Open the mail notification and claim the NFT
bell.gif_guide_title:
💡 Follow the reminders to
turn on email notifications
bell.open_notification_prompt:
You can authorize our email push service at any time by flipping the switch above and clicking "Allow".

Don't worry, we will only notify you when you receive new emails.

Complete the authorization and we will send you a confirmation email with a special NFT ;)
bell.open_notification_prompt_list:
• Authorize our email push service at any time by flipping the switch above and clicking "Allow".
  • Don't worry, we will only notify you when you receive new emails.

edit-message.title: New Message
edit-message.subject: Subject

community_guide_modal.title: You‚Äôve found a super cool feature!

text.1: 1. Customize your audience by specific tokens, send direct mails to them in bulk.
text.2: 2. Push the project updates, DAO voting messages, and private information to the target users accurately.

edit-message.Apply to become a beta user: Apply to become a beta user
edit-message.You will have the possibility to experie: You will have the possibility to experience this cool feature for the first time.
edit-message.drift_bottle_template: Write down your emotions, thoughts, questions, and even heartfelt secrets. The drift bottle will float with these to another user, and you will have a chance to get a response
edit-message.leave_modal_title: Are you sure you want to leave this page?

filename_verify.empty: Oops! File names cannot be empty

home.title: The mail for crypto natives
home.desc: Take control of your mail communication with decentralized ID by Mail3.

trash.title: Trash
trash.auto-delete: Messages that have been in Trash more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.

spam.title: Spam
spam.auto-delete: Messages that have been in Spam more than 30 days will be automatically deleted.

drafts.title: Drafts
drafts.no-content-w1: Any time you start writing a new Email,
drafts.no-content-w2: Mail3 will automatically save it as a draft along the way.
drafts.no-content-w3: Come here to find all your works in progress.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to continue?
delete.description: This operation will completely delete the message and cannot be recovered.

trash.ok: The message has been moved to the trash.

delete.ok: The message has been completely deleted.

spam.ok: The messages have been moved to spam

notSpam.ok: The messages have been moved to Inbox

address.text:
The addresses listed below have been automatically activated as your mail3 addresses.
You can receive all emails sent to these addresses,
regardless of whether they are selected as the default outgoing address.
address.hover-title: üîî This email address will be shown on mail that you send. You can change it at any time.
address.hover-content: You can choose one of the domain names we have resolved for you below as your default address at any time.
address.outgoing: Your default address for sending emails.
address.title: Your wallet address and the domain names
address.desc: you owned all can be used as mail3 address to send and receive emails.
address.default-hover: This address will be the default address for sending emails.
address.request-failed: Request change default address failed, please try again later.
address.not-found-p1:
Oops!!

Cannot associate to your domain name
